name: The Elf Job
description:
Santa needs your help! He's lost his magic bells, and called Elfie to find them for him. This is my entry for the Toast 2021 game jam, the theme is "Bells".

Note: Recommended age is 13+, mature themes are suggested in the dialogue. 

Controls

Movement - Arrow Keys/ WASD

Talk - Enter/Space/Left Click

Credits

Game design and programming - Marcus Sanatan

Music:

Ikson - Christmas,  https://www.iksonmusic.com

Ikson - Present, https://www.iksonmusic.com

Sound FX:

Mike Koenig - Magic Wand Noise, https://soundbible.com/474-Magic-Wand-Noise.html

Art:

Franuka - Snow Tileset, https://franuka.itch.io/rpg-snow-tileset

Fonts:

Kenney, https://kenney.itch.io/kenney-game-assets-3
